sentence.Network_en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

sentence.Network_en: I'm guessing again now because I'm not hooked into the political circles.
sentence.Network_cn: 我现在又是在猜测了，因为我没有涉足政界。

sentence.Network_en: He spent a number of years hooked on cocaine, heroin and alcohol.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有好几年时间吸食可卡因和海洛因成瘾，还整日酗酒。

entry.def: If you describe something as hooked, you mean that it is shaped like a hook.

example.ex: He was thin and tall, with a hooked nose.
example.tran: 他又瘦又高，长着鹰钩鼻。

entry.def: If you are hooked on something, you enjoy it so much that it takes up a lot of your interest and attention.

example.ex: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money...
example.tran: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

example.ex: Open this book and read a few pages and you will be hooked.
example.tran: 打开这本书读上几页，你就会沉迷其中。

entry.def: If you are hooked on a drug, you are addicted to it.

example.ex: He spent a number of years hooked on cocaine, heroin and alcohol.
example.tran: 他有好几年时间吸食可卡因和海洛因成瘾，还整日酗酒。

means.word_mean: 1. curved down like an eagle's beak

sentences.en: People who are truly hooked will go to any lengths to satisfy their craving for the drug.
sentences.cn: 真正吸毒成瘾的人为了满足毒瘾会不择手段。

sentences.en: a master storyteller who knows how to keep his readers hooked
sentences.cn: 善于牢牢抓住读者的讲故事高手
